Package ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.helpers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConnectivityBroadcastReceiver
    Receives a broadcast anytime the connection state changes.
    ConnectivityHelper
    Provides status about the user's current Internet connection.
    ElasticSearchClient
    This class is responsible for ElasticSearch operations.
    ElasticSearchQueries
    A utility class for ElasticSearch.
    ErrorDialog
    Helper class.
    GsonHelper
    Genereates and returns Gson objects with the required type converters set.
    HashHelper
    Helper class.
    ImageHelper
    Creates a file to store an image and returns it.
    LocationListenerService
    Location Listener Service handles location updates from the Android framework Used to update geoLocation objects and return the current location when asked
    MapHelper
    This class holds all map data and encapsulates some common procedures required to perform map operations
    SortUtil
    Helper class.
    Toaster
    Shows a toast with a given message on screen.
